title: Guinness casserole
ingredients: ['1kg braising steak, cut into small pieces', '500ml Guinness', '500ml water', '4 beef stock cubes (Knorr or similar)', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 or 5 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '300g French Beans, cut into 2.5cm pieces (fresh or frozen)', '2 (400g) tins mixed beans in tomato sauce (or baked beans)']
